public class TemperatureSensor
extends java.lang.Object

File: TemperatureSensor.java Authors: Sean Jagat and Nick Knowlson Assignment: 4 Class: CPS235 Instructor: Frank Niscak Due Date: November 23, 2007 Purpose: The TemperatureSensor class simulates a sensor on the vehicle and manages updating itself to the client
